metadata.title: CVE-2024-53077 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:rpcrdma: Always release the rpcrdma_device's xa_arrayDai pointed out that the xa_init_flags() in rpcrdma_add_one() needsto have a matching xa_destroy() in rpcrdma_remove_one() to releaseunderlying memory that the xarray might have accrued duringoperation.
